group_1.textRight: Now your wish has been granted.

group_1.textLeft: Eh?... Meguru doesn't feel like anything has changed though?

group_1.textRight: No, the wish has been granted.

group_1.textLeft: Then... maybe I can be a popular MC...
But popular with who?
The school? Japan? The whole world?

group_1.textRight: Not even I can answer that.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm....
Ah! Maybe my live coverage skills have taken an explosive leap forward!?
Then let's try something...
For example... There! The bird resting on that tree!
Ah... Ah... Ahem!
Everyone, did you notice!?
There's a sweet little bird resting on the @ninety-year old zelkova tree!
With a tiny body that belies its formidable inner strength, it's simply majestic!
After taking a short break, it readies itself for the @next stretch of the journey!
Look! With a flap of its wings, it's off!!
Meguru... can't believe she said those words @just now!!
I've got to try it one more time..!
Hey, show me that picture.

group_1.textRight: Quit asking, I already deleted it!

group_1.textLeft: No way, you're lying.
Show me if I win in rock paper scissors.

group_1.textCenter: At first glance, these boys appear to be fooling @around lightheartedly!
However, the truth is that they are engaged in deep psychological warfare!
Is it hell if you see it, or hell if you show it?
And now a rock paper scissors battle has started @too!

group_1.textRight: It seems like you finally got the hang of it.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah!
These are but normal, everyday situations.
And Meguru breathed life into them simply by @talking!
If I can use these skills for the broadcasting club’s activities...
There's no doubt that saving the broadcasting club @will pave the way...
For Meguru’s dream of becoming a popular MC!
Now, off to the broadcasting room...
Wh-what was that?

group_1.textRight: That was a Witch, hurry Meguru!

group_1.textLeft: But Meguru needs to go to the broadcasting club room..!

group_1.textRight: When you made the contract and became a @Magical girl, you agreed to fight Witches.

group_1.textLeft: Ungh...
Then there's no other way...!
Player Meguru can only forge ahead!
